trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Auburn Hills
There were no other sightings in Auburn Hills on or around July 17th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi have a landscape co. i always look outside to sky, to check the weather. this day i looked though the door window and out of nowhere this saucer a peered, just above the trees. i was looking south. it would be maybe 1\8- 1\4 mile away. near i75 & adams n\b. it zaged left & then right in a southern direction. and it was gone, just like that! i thought it was prety amazing. then a couple of days after that a man on local news reported a sighting, in bloomfield, mi.
